response.overview: Erin Maguire's debut comedy special BASELINE PRESENTABLE will have you laughing until the tears roll down your legs. Erin is a NYC based stand up and podcast host who has been featured on Gotham Live, The Tamron Hall Show, ESPN, and the Game Show Network. She wrote on the Comedy Central Roast of Alec Baldwin (before 'the incident') and created two board games, Seinfeld and Netflix, for SpinMaster Games. Her comedy advice podcast, Dear Pod, was on iTunes top 100 comedy pods and is soooo not safe for work. BASELINE PRESENTABLE is Erin's inaugural album, a collection of ridiculous observations and act outs and she hopes you like it so much that 800 Pound Gorilla Records wants her to do ten more. Follow her on instagram @erinmaguireofficial because there are dogs with more followers than her... and they're getting book deals.
response.title: Erin Maguire: Baseline Presentable

results.name: Erin Maguire | Baseline Presentable (Full Comedy Special)
